short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple note-taking extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Note Taker is a simple and easy-to-use Chrome extension that allows users to quickly jot down notes while browsing the web. Keep track of ideas, to-dos, or any other information you want to save for later. Your notes are stored locally in your browser, so you don't need to worry about privacy. Give Note Taker  a try and improve your productivity today!
